EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_ENG_2_Technical_eBook
EmailTemplate.subject: Need to increase network security and reliability?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Three keys to a more secure and reliable network As networking technologies and architectural frameworks continue to evolve, they’re bringing more connections and more diverse traffic to your network than ever before — making it harder to manage, prone to performance issues and more vulnerable to security issues. Read our latest eBook and discover how Secure Service Enablement from Nokia can help you:
- Simplify complexity - Strengthen security - Improve performance Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
